bill.summary: 4/8/1987--Introduced. Declares that the Congress: (1) expresses its appreciation for Columbia College's contributions to the Nation and the people of the United States; (2) recognizes Columbia College's 200th anniversary of excellence in higher education; and (3) congratulates Columbia College.
